entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
#Welcome to my blog! (This might get updated once in a while)

My name is Sebastian Mossberg.

The reason i started this blog is to document my progress towards becoming a Software Developer.
Im not only going to post according to that. I’m also going to post things that I’m learning at the moment together with my thoughts on Tech & Programming things.

If you want to read information about me feel free to click on [About] (http://blog.msbrg.net/about/) at the top.
